results.title: Remembering the past and looking forward to the future
results.creator_credit: Cuong Manh Pham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A story of escape by boat from Vietnam to a Malaysian refugee camp, and then to Australia in 1986 where Cuong Manh Pham eventually made a new life, reuniting with his family in 1990.

results.title: A Little memory
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Truyen Dinh Le and ACMI
results.brief_description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Truyen Dinh Le and ACMI
results.description: Truyen Dinh Le, a refugee himself from Vietnam, tells a harrowing story of courage and determination by his father-in-law to find peace and a better life for his family, away from the war in Vietnam to the safe haven of Australian shores.

results.title: East meets West
results.brief_description: West is a theatre company made up of actors, musicians and directors. In this program, the members of the company are working together with a Melbourne Vietnamese community and have devised a play which is intended as a welcome to Vietnamese immigrants in Australia. Scenes from rehearsals and excerpts from the performances are included.
results.description: West is a theatre company made up of actors, musicians and directors. In this program, the members of the company are working together with a Melbourne Vietnamese community and have devised a play which is intended as a welcome to Vietnamese immigrants in Australia. Scenes from rehearsals and excerpts from the performances are included.
description_for_label: West is a theatre company made up of actors, musicians and directors. In this program, the members of the company are working together with a Melbourne Vietnamese community and have devised a play which is intended as a welcome to Vietnamese immigrants in Australia. Scenes from rehearsals and excerpts from the performances are included.

results.title: Australyaya Gelisiminhikayesi = Coming to Australia
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Riza Guclu and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Riza Guclu moved to Australia with his family, he was looking for a better life, like most immigrants. With that in mind, he learnt what he need to help him succeed.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Riza Guclu and ACMI

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Bayram Ocal and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.

results.title: Yeni dunyam = My new world
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Yusuf Hazar and ACMI
results.brief_description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Yusuf Hazar and ACMI

results.title: My second home
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Memet Gunes and ACMI
results.brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Memet Gunes and ACMI

results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Huseyin Duman and ACMI

results.title: New life new country
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Fatma Coskun and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Fatma Coskun and ACMI
results.description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
